programme.desc: BBC Three. The best in new entertainment, comedy, contemporary drama and music for the digital generation. Stay tuned for 60 Seconds news.
programme.title: This Is BBC Three

programme.desc: 11/16. Muscle Cars: Motoring show. Which is the best modern muscle car? Adam, Rutledge and Tanner fight it out on the way to a high speed attempt at a Nascar track. [S]
programme.title: Top Gear USA

programme.desc: 12/16. Dangerous Cars: Motoring show. The hosts each choose a car thought of as the 'most dangerous car in the country' and try to restore its reputation in a series of crazy challenges. [S]
programme.title: Top Gear USA

programme.desc: 9/10. Tessa, Nina and Ryan: Makeunder show with Ellie Taylor. POD helps two Barbie wannabes who've turned sisterhood into an un-classy act and a burger-flipper often mistaken for a girl. [S]
programme.title: Snog Marry Avoid?

programme.desc: 6/6. Comedy murder mystery series. Helen is moved to D Wing where she is befriended by white collar criminal Jo. Margaret is determined to make her potential incumbent's life a misery. [AD,S]
programme.title: Dead Boss

programme.desc: 5/6. A comic look at life in Britain. Emily and Florence play tennis while Kenny Craig has a girlfriend. With Anthony Head and John Culshaw. Contains adult humour. [AD,S]
programme.title: Little Britain

programme.desc: Phil is furious when Jay and Ben confess the truth about their recent actions, and points out that things could soon be over for them all as a result. [AD,S]
programme.title: EastEnders

programme.desc: 10/21. Big Man on Hippocampus: Animated US comedy. After hitting his head Peter develops amnesia and forgets everything, including his family and friends. Contains adult humour. [S]
programme.title: Family Guy

programme.desc: 11/21. Dial Meg for Murder: Animated comedy. After trailing Meg around for research for his magazine writer's job, Brian discovers she has a secret boyfriend. Contains some violence. [S]
programme.title: Family Guy

programme.desc: 6/16. The 42-Year-Old Virgin: Animated series. Stan is outed as a virgin, in that he has never killed anyone, so the guys rally round to help him pop his cherry. Contains adult humour. [S]
programme.title: American Dad!

programme.desc: 7/16. Surro-Gate: Animated series about a CIA man. When Francine decides to be a surrogate for her gay neighbours Terry and Greg, Stan's Republican blood boils. Contains adult humour. [S]
programme.title: American Dad!

programme.desc: Ireland's economic recession has led to a boom in the unlikely genre of Irish rap. This film follows bands like Class A'z as they try to find success. Contains very strong language. [S]
programme.title: Irish Rappers Revealed

programme.desc: 8/8. Best Bits: Highlights from series four. Russell Howard gives his take on key news stories and highlights the bizarre items that have caught his eye. Contains some strong language. [S]
programme.title: Russell Howard's Good News
